content: butterflies everywhere crochet materials 1 ball findley by juniper moon farm crochet hook size e gauge 24 double_crochet sts and 10 row = 4 finished size after blocked 14 by 50 abbreviations chain chain double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet single_crochet single_crochet repeat repeat sts stitches instructions chain 116 sts row 1 work 1 double_crochet into 8th chain from hook *2 chain skip 2 chain 1 double_crochet into next chain repeat from * to end turn row2 5 chain skip first double_crochet 1 double_crochet into next double_crochet *4ch 1 treble_crochet into each of next 4 double_crochet 4ch 1dc into next double_crochet 2ch 1dc into next double_crochet repeat from * to end placing last double_crochet into 3rd turning chain at beginning of previous row turn row 3 5ch skip first double_crochet 1dc into next double_crochet *4ch 1sc into each of next 4 treble_crochet 4ch 1dc into next double_crochet 2ch 1dc into next double_crochet repeat from *to end placing last double_crochet into 3rd of 5ch at beginning of previous row turn row 4 5ch skip first double_crochet 1 double_crochet into next double_crochet *4ch 1sc into each of next 4 single_crochet 4ch 1dc into next double_crochet 2ch 1dc into next double_crochet repeat from *to end placing last double_crochet into 3rd of5ch at beginning of previous row turn row 5 same as 4th row row 6 5ch skip first double_crochet 1dc into next double_crochet *2ch 1tr into next single_crochet 2ch 4 times 1dc into next double_crochet 2ch 1dc into next double_crochet repeat from *to end placing last double_crochet into 3rd of5ch at beginning of previous row turn row 7 5ch skip first double_crochet 1dc into next double_crochet *2ch 1dc into next treble_crochet 2ch 4 times 1dc into next double_crochet 2ch 1dc into next double_crochet repeat from *to end placing last double_crochet into 3rd of5ch at beginning of previous row turn repeat from 2nd to 7th row until desired length block
